Welcome to the Oregon Trail!
On this 2000 mile adventure, you will be playing as the young girl Hattie Campbell, traveling the trail to Oregon with your family.
First, you will choose the names of your family members. After that, you'll travel to the General Store to buy supplies for the trail.
While are shops at each fort, on the trail you will be on your own. Prepare well and be ready for whatever the trail might bring!
